Metadata.defaultTitle: Online Timer Tool - Precise Countdown Timer
Metadata.description: Free online countdown timer with multiple simultaneous timers, precise to the second. Perfect for exams, meetings, events, and time management. Simple to use, no installation required.
Metadata.keywords: countdown timer, online timer, time management, timer tool, exam timer, meeting timer, event countdown
Metadata.ogTitle: Online Timer Tool - Precise Countdown Timer
Metadata.ogDescription: Free online countdown timer with multiple simultaneous timers, precise to the second. Perfect for exams, meetings, and events.
Metadata.twitterTitle: Online Timer Tool - Precise Countdown Timer
Metadata.twitterDescription: Free online countdown timer with multiple simultaneous timers, precise to the second.

Index.title: Countdown Timer - Online Timer Accurate to Seconds
Index.description: Free online countdown timer, supporting multiple countdowns simultaneously, accurate to seconds, perfect for exams, meetings, events, and more.
Index.heroTitle: Simple and Easy-to-use Online Countdown Timer
Index.heroSubtitle: Precise timing for your every important moment
Index.thirtyMinDesc: Ideal for short meetings, breaks, etc.

Features.fullscreenDesc: Clear large font, visible from a distance
Features.themesDesc: Support light/dark modes, various color schemes
